name: GLUN
description:
GLUN is a game made in less than 48 hrs for the Game Makers Toolkit Gamejam.

Traverse through the underworld as your dead self goes to get revenge on the weird creatures that inhabit it. But be careful when handling your mini gun, it has quite the kick!

The objective of this game is to defeat all the enemies in the level while trying to maneuver and not get killed. 

Your weapon is your source of damage but also your way to get around the map. 

*This game can only be played with a controller* 

Aim with Left Analog Button, and shoot with A (X on PS).

Let us know how you like it. Enjoy!
